data.message: I'm your number one Canadian cougar fan haha Can't wait to see you live one day. After all the years of listening  to you, and explaining to my daughter some of the lyrics. And actually getting into a verbal fight at the opening of "Eight Mile" back in the day.  With both my girls with me (probly 15 and 7 at the time) I love you Marshall Mathers!!!   Xoxo. Hope this isn't to creepy haha.
